title: Bobby Encounters A Spit Talker + Lunchbox Gets Turned Down To Host Charity Event
itunes:title: Bobby Encounters A Spit Talker + Lunchbox Gets Turned Down To Host Charity Event
description:
Bobby recounts his run-in with a ‘spit-talker.’ Lunchbox gets turned away from hosting a huge charity event. Also, Bobby presides as Judge Common Sense for a listener needing marital advice.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
